description: Dropdown select component for choosing one option from a list. Native HTML select element with v-model binding. Keyboard navigable and accessible.
useCase: Use for dropdowns, filters, country selectors, category pickers, and any single-choice selection from predefined options. Prefer over custom dropdowns for accessibility.

options.description: Array of {value, label} objects for <option> elements

placeholder.description: Optional first option with empty value as placeholder

automation.recognitionPattern: Detected by <select> tag, enhanced recognition in automation_agent.js v20
automation.note: Supports automation actions: select(option_value), focus(). Native select element is keyboard accessible (arrow keys, type to search).
